# MILE-TEST-001: Simple Milestone

**Status:** Not Started
**Created:** 2026-01-12
**Target:** 2026-02-01
**Completed:**
**Owner:** Test

---

## Value Delivered

Users can manage their settings through a clean UI with proper data persistence.

## Scope

### What's Included

Two independent features that can be built in any order.

### What's NOT Included

Advanced features, integrations.

---

## Features

| # | Feature | Priority | Status |
|---|---------|----------|--------|
| 1 | [simple-feature](../features/simple-feature.md) | High | Planning |
| 2 | [ui-feature](../features/ui-feature.md) | High | Planning |

### Feature Summary

**Critical (must ship):**
- simple-feature - Basic settings with API and database
- ui-feature - UI components for settings

---

## Dependencies

### Technical Dependencies

None required.

### Milestone Dependencies

None - this is a standalone test milestone.

---

## Done When

- [ ] All features complete and tested
- [ ] Settings UI renders correctly
- [ ] API endpoints respond correctly

---

## Notes

Test fixture for Scenario 2: Multiple Features in Milestone.
Features have no inter-dependencies, can execute in listed order.
